title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater stylish, soft, and comfortable, with one mentioning it can be dressed up or down. They appreciate its warmth and perfect length, noting it's long enough to wear with leggings. The quality receives positive feedback, and customers like its fit, though opinions are mixed - some find it true to size while others say it's too large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars WANT IN OTHER COLORS
items.body: This sweater dress is 10/10 it is so cute and flattering. It is very comfortable and soft. It’s a great picture/holiday/going out dress. You can dress it up or down. Read more
items.author: Madeline Broome

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorbs
items.body: Super cute and warm. I wear it belted. Read more
items.author: kayla

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice style, average quality
items.body: I really like the way this dress looks, it is exactly what I was looking for! Ordered the red wine color first, then added the black one because I really liked the shape and the style. I got a size Large based on the size chart, my measurements are 37” chest, 31” waist, 43” hip. The dress is a bit big in the top part, but fits just right in the hip area - so I do like the overall fit. The quality of the fabric is not my favorite. It is somewhat scratchy and the black one started pilling after one wear (side note- the black one appeared to be a return when it arrived to me, even though it still had tags on it, I have a feeling it might have been worn at least once). The burgundy one was in a way better shape when received. Overall, I like the way this dress looks and the price is budget friendly. Read more
items.author: Julia

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love the dress...quality control is terrible!
items.body: I’ve ordered quite a bit from Amazon, but this is the first time I’ve received multiple clearly used items. The first dress arrived with a dark thread embedded in the bust area. Because the dress is light-colored, it was very noticeable, and removing it would damage the fabric. Amazon sent a replacement, which was even worse—clearly worn and washed, extremely fuzzy, no tags, dirt embedded in the fibers, and multiple stains. I honestly couldn’t believe it was sent out as new. That said, I love the dress itself, which is why this is so frustrating. I’m 5’2” with an athletic build, and sweater dresses usually cling to my hips and backside. This one drapes really nicely without looking oversized on my frame. If you’re very slim, this may not be the best fit—but for curves or an athletic shape, it’s flattering. I’ve ordered a third dress, so we’ll see if it arrives in new condition. Shipping is slow, and if this one isn’t right, I’m done. Disappointing quality control for an otherwise great dress. Read more
items.author: Candace

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Greeat for winter in the north
items.body: Soft, deep, nice colork, no itch. Right above my knee at 5'3". Perfect for leggings. Great for work, winter socializing, any cold dat. Very warm! Read more
items.author: Mary

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Likes Comfort and Style
items.author: Susan Turner

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Used item
items.body: I received a used item. Regretfully I am not able to return it for now, so no matter I requested refund I won't get it. I bought two colors of the same item. The other one was fine. Read more
items.author: Gthompson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A go to piece
items.body: This Sweater is beautiful. I got it in army green in the fall. I'm 5'1" and 130 lbs, but like a large. Even oversized, it still looks great. It's long and warm and super stylish with the right accessories. It's soft, washes well and keeps its shape. The best thing is that getting dressed to go out in the winter is thoughtless. The sweater has you covered. Read more
items.author: JMU

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rose Red, Wine Red, Beige, Blue Green, Grey Blue, Army Green, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
